mapper.select: SELECT FEEDS_ID 'feedsId', FROM_ID 'fromId', TO_ID 'toId', ASSOCIATION_ID 'associationId', STATE 'state', CREATE_TIME 'createTime', FEEDS_TYPE 'feedsType' FROM ss_feeds WHERE TO_ID = #{id} AND STATE = '0'

SELECT sa.AUTHOR_REC 'authorRec', sa.VIEW_NUM 'viewNum', sa.COMMENTS_NUM 'commentsNum', sa.UPDATE_TIME 'updateTime', sa.CREATE_TIME 'createTime', sa.ARTICLE_IMG 'articleImg', sa.ARTICLE_TYPE 'articleType', sa.ARTICLE_DESC 'articleDesc', sa.ARTICLE_TITLE 'articleTitle', CAST(sa.ARTICLE_ID as char) 'articleId' FROM ss_article sa WHERE sa.USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT COMMENT_ID 'commentId',USER_ID 'userId', ARTICLE_ID 'articleId', COMMENT_CONTENT 'commentContent', TO_COMMENT_ID 'toCommentId' FROM ss_article_comments WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND STATE = '1'
SELECT NOTIFY_ID 'notifyId',ASSOCIATION_ID 'associationId', FROM_ID 'fromId', TO_ID 'toId', CREATE_TIME 'createTime', EVENT_TYPE 'eventType' FROM ss_notify WHERE TO_ID = #{id} AND STATE = '0'
